comment._content: This is en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duchess_Cecilie_of_Mecklenburg-Schw... Another picture is at www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3576205594/ The son is probably Prince Friedrich, born in 1911.

comment._content: Thanks Swang for the information about  this image. We will add some of it to the image description.

comment.author: 60861613@N00
comment._content: Prince Friedrich Georg Wilhelm Christoph of Prussia (19 December 1911 – 20 April 1966) was the great-great grandson of Queen Victoria of Great Britain through the line of her eldest daughter Victoria who married into the German royal family.
